Key Match Events: Romo drove in a career-high three runs with a double in the second inning and an RBI groundout in the eighth.
Beck had the go-ahead RBI single in the eighth inning that proved decisive.
Pre-Game Insights: Rockies manager Bud Black emphasized the importance of the game, noting that other teams are watching, including the Yankees and Diamondbacks.
Post-Match Reflections: Romo expressed feeling more comfortable and focused at the plate.
Orioles manager Brandon Hyde expressed relief that X-rays were negative after Kremer was hit by a line drive.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Orioles third baseman Ramón Urías suffered a sprained ankle after a slide.
The game's outcome could impact the Orioles' wild-card race and standings.
